snippet.title: Disney Minnie Mouse Bow-tique Super Surprise Party! | LeapFrog
snippet.description:
It's a busy day at Minnie's Bow-tique – everyone's getting ready for a super secret surprise party! Join in the fun and help Minnie Mouse and Daisy turn ribbon and dazzles into beautiful bows for all of their friends. Minnie's Bow-tique Super Surprise Party is wonderful learning game that builds language and memory skills while encouraging creative play with help from your child's favorite Disney characters.

• Play three curricular games to prepare for the party, including Ribbon Roundup, Butterfly Bows and Daisy's Dressing Room.
• Difficulty level automatically adjusts to your child's skill level for just the right learning challenge.
• Teaches word sounds, letter recognition, memory skills, logic & reasoning and colors.
• Appropriate for children ages 3 to 5 years (pre-K to K).
• Works with LeapPad learning tablets, Leapster Explorer and LeapsterGS game systems (sold separately).

Learn more about Minnie's Bow-tique Surprise Party: http://bit.ly/1u929Xc

LeapFrog creates award-winning educational solutions that delight, engage and inspire children to reach their potential. We know that children learn best when they’re having fun, and that every child learns differently. With solutions that are personalized to each child’s level, every day brings pure learning fun. Visit us at http://www.leapfrog.com/

See more learning tips and videos on our channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/LeapFrogOfficialSite
